here because I'm getting a lot from this list and
would hate to have to drop it.

Lydia, mom to Lyndsey who is sleeping

messages.subject: keeping up with mail
messages.msgSnippet: I m not sure if you have tried this but the digest version works wonders.  you get the whole thing at once and just scroll through to what you want to read.  I
messages.messageBody:
I'm not sure if you have tried this but the digest version works
wonders. you get the whole thing at once and just scroll through to
what you want to read. I personally like it and I have all my mail
like that because it is more condesed. All you have to do is go
to "my groups" @ the yahoo site and you can pull your list of groups
up and there is a thing to clck there to digest - sorry I can't
remember what it's called.
